title: What is the Barcelona tennis schedule?
description: Play continues Friday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players headlining the quarter-final action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz and second seed Casper Ruud. View Friday's full order of play below (how to watch).    ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 18 APRIL 2025 Pista Rafa Nadal - start 11 a.m. Karen Khachanov vs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP) [6] Holger Rune (DEN) vs [2] Casper Ruud (NOR) Not Before 4 p.m. [1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Followed By [3] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs [7] Arthur Fils (FRA) Pista Andres Gimeno - start 10:30 a.m. [4] Luca Daraban (ROU) vs Teo Casadesus (ESP) Not Before 2 p.m. Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs Hugo Nys (MON) / John Peers (AUS) Sander Arends (NED) / Luke Johnson (GBR) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Play continues Thursday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players in action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz, fourth seed Andrey Rublev and fifth seed Alex de Minaur.

Barcelona

View the full Friday order of play for Barcelona

April 17, 2025

Eric Alonso/Getty Images

The Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell is played at the Real Club de Tenis Barcelona-1899. By ATP Staff

Play continues Friday at the Barcelona Open Banc Sabadell, the ATP 500 event in Spain. Among the players headlining the quarter-final action will be top seed Carlos Alcaraz and second seed Casper Ruud.

View Friday's full order of play below (how to watch). 

You May Also Like: Nadal’s 2005 Barcelona triumph: Cruising on clay, all the way to the Top 10!

ORDER OF PLAY - FRIDAY, 18 APRIL 2025
Pista Rafa Nadal - start 11 a.m.
Karen Khachanov vs Alejandro Davidovich Fokina (ESP)
[6] Holger Rune (DEN) vs [2] Casper Ruud (NOR)

Not Before 4 p.m.
[1] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [5] Alex de Minaur (AUS)

Followed By
[3] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) vs [7] Arthur Fils (FRA)

Pista Andres Gimeno - start 10:30 a.m.
[4] Luca Daraban (ROU) vs Teo Casadesus (ESP)

Not Before 2 p.m.
Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs Hugo Nys (MON) / John Peers (AUS)
Sander Arends (NED) / Luke Johnson (GBR) vs Ariel Behar (URU) / Joran Vliegen (BEL)
